sentences.en: "All right, I can manage a fiver," McMinn said with reluctance.
sentences.cn: 麦克明不情愿地说：“好吧，我可以出5镑。”

sentences.en: a brewery which has been owned and managed by the same family for over 100 years
sentences.cn: 被同一个家族拥有和经营了一百多年的啤酒厂

sentences.en: He was asked to manage a new department.
sentences.cn: 他被要求去管理一个新的部门。

sentences.en: How do you manage to keep the place so tidy?
sentences.cn: 你是怎样把这里保持得如此整洁的？

sentences.en: I don’t know how I’ll manage it , but I’ll be there.
sentences.cn: 我还不知道怎么去，但我会去的。

sentences.en: I don’t know how she manages with seven children.
sentences.cn: 我不知道七个孩子她是怎么应付的。

sentences.en: I doubt whether Jack could manage a sailing boat.
sentences.cn: 我怀疑杰克会不会驾驶帆船.

sentences.en: I know you mean well, but I can manage by myself.
sentences.cn: 我明白您的好意，不过我自己能行。

sentences.en: I manage a hotel.
sentences.cn: 我经营一家旅馆。

sentences.en: In a busy world, managing your time is increasingly important.
sentences.cn: 在一个忙碌的世界里，管理好你的时间越来越重要。

sentences.en: Josh expects me to manage all the household expenses on very little.
sentences.cn: 乔希指望我对每笔家庭支出都精打细算。

sentences.en: Juventus managed two goals in the last ten minutes.
sentences.cn: 在最后十分钟里，尤文图斯队攻进了两个球。

sentences.en: Managing a football team is harder than you think.
sentences.cn: 管理一支足球队比你想象的要难。

sentences.en: Petroleum engineers plan and manage the extraction of oil.
sentences.cn: 石油工程师规划并管理石油的提炼。

sentences.en: Professors are notoriously difficult to manage.
sentences.cn: 教授们很难管理是出了名的。

sentences.en: She has a bit of private money, so they manage quite nicely.
sentences.cn: 她有一点私房钱，所以他们过得很舒心。

sentences.en: Some manage it. Some fail miserably.
sentences.cn: 有些人成功了，而有些人则遭遇惨败。

sentences.en: The company had been very badly managed.
sentences.cn: 公司管理非常糟糕。

sentences.en: The pilot did manage to get airborne.
sentences.cn: 飞行员的确设法使飞机升空了。

sentences.en: They manage a company offering advice on mergers and acquisitions.
sentences.cn: 他们经营着一家为兼并收购业务提供咨询的公司。

sentences.en: We didn’t have the proper equipment, but we managed somehow.
sentences.cn: 我们没有合适的设备，但不管怎么样我们还是对付过去了。

sentences.en: We manage to get most of our produce in Britain.
sentences.cn: 我们设法在英国搞到我们所需的大部分农产品。

sentences.en: We shall have to manage with these old pencils.
sentences.cn: 我们只得凑合着用这些旧铅笔.

sentences.en: We'll manage somehow, you and me. I know we will.
sentences.cn: 我和你，我们总能应付过去的。我知道我们会的。

words.tran_cn: 易管理的；易控制的；易办的
管理；管理人员；管理部门；操纵；经营手段

phrases.tran_cn: 挣扎做某事；设法完成某事
没有…而仍设法对付过去

trans.tran_cn: 管理，经营，安排(时间、金钱等)，设法做到，成功对付，强作
trans.tran_en: to direct or control a business or department and the people, equipment, and money involved in it
If you manage time, money, or other resources, you deal with them carefully and do not waste them

trans.tran_cn: 管理，经营，处理；设法做到；控制，驾驭
trans.tran_en: to direct or control a business or department and the people, equipment, and money involved in it
